test

Class IPv4RoutingTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.IPv4RoutingTest

  • public class IPv4RoutingTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Routing in IPv4 network with Manhattan topology and external network.

    • Method Detail

      • testHybridRoute

        public static void testHybridRoute(boolean tcpdump)
        Test with one router and one host. The router has two interfaces respectively attached to the external Ethernet network and to an internal virtual link. The host is attached to the virtual link.

        (Ethernet)---R1---(link1)---H1

        Parameters:
        tcpdump - whether running tcpdump

      • testLinearNetwork

        public static void testLinearNetwork(int n,
                                     java.lang.String r0_ext_if,
                                     Ip4AddressPrefix r0_ext_addr_prefix,
                                     CentralizedSPF.Algorithm algo,
                                     boolean udp_echo,
                                     boolean tcpdump,
                                     int ping_count,
                                     long ping_time)
        IPv4 linear topology with N routers, and one host. The first router G0 may be a gateway connected to external network.

        (Ethernet)-G0-(link0)-R1-(link1)-R2-(link2)-..-(linkN-2)-R[N-1]-(linkN-1)-H1

        Parameters:
        n - the number of routers, including the access gateway
        r0_ext_if - external interface of G0 (or null in case of virtual interface)
        r0_ext_addr_prefix - IPv4 address and prefix length on the external interface of G0
        algo - shortest-path algorithm
        udp_echo - whether running a UDP echo server on H2
        tcpdump - whether running tcpdump
        ping_count - number of ping requests
        ping_time - time between ping requests

      • testManhattan

        public static void testManhattan(int n,
                                 java.lang.String r0_ext_if,
                                 Ip4AddressPrefix r0_ext_addr_prefix,
                                 int k,
                                 CentralizedSPF.Algorithm algo,
                                 boolean udp_echo,
                                 boolean tcpdump,
                                 int ping_count,
                                 long ping_time)
        IPv4 Manhattan topology with NxN routers, and one host. The router R00 may be a gateway connected to external network.
        Parameters:
        n - nxn is the size of the network
        r0_ext_if - external interface of R00 (or null in case of virtual interface)
        r0_ext_addr_prefix - IPv4 address and prefix length on the external interface of R00
        k - the index of the network where the host is attached
        algo - shortest-path algorithm
        udp_echo - whether running a UDP echo server on H2
        tcpdump - whether running tcpdump
        ping_count - number of ping requests
        ping_time - time between ping requests

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method.
